mapper.sql: id, ip, miner, workerName, factoryName, frameName, groupName, is_onLine, is_come_in, remarks, isDelete, createTime, updateTime, tenant_id
mapper.insert: insert into worker (ip, miner, workerName, factoryName, frameName, groupName, is_onLine, is_come_in, remarks, isDelete, createTime, updateTime, tenant_id) values (#{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{miner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{factoryname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{framename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isOnline,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isComeIn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isdelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tenantId,jdbcType=BIGINT})

mapper.update:
update worker
ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

workerName = #{workername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update worker set ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, miner = #{miner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, workerName = #{workername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, factoryName = #{factoryname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, frameName = #{framename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, groupName = #{groupname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_onLine = #{isOnline,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_come_in = #{isComeIn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isDelete = #{isdelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, tenant_id = #{tenantId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from worker
isDelete = 0
AND (ip like #{keyWord} or `miner` like #{keyWord} or `workerName` like #{keyWord} or `frameName` like #{keyWord})
